messages.subject: Re: [Unschooling-dotcom] New to list in Seattle
messages.msgSnippet: Welcome! I m Amy, unschooling mom to three girls 7, 4, and 2 from MA. ... From: Earth Moon  To:
messages.messageBody:
Welcome! I'm Amy, unschooling mom to three girls 7, 4, and 2 from MA.
----- Original Message -----
From: Earth Moon <earthmoonwater@...>
To: <Unschooling-dotcom@egroups.com>
Sent: Sunday, April 30, 2000 4:26 PM
Subject: [Unschooling-dotcom] New to list in Seattle


>
> >Hello :) We're a family of 3 with one on the way. Our very spirited son
> >(the pooter) is about 3yo, and the leetle baby is comming in January.
>
> I look forward to getting to know the list, and hopefully to stay, if I
> click here :) Unschooling has been the educational goal I have for my
> children since I was in HS, and I revel in watching my 3yo learn about the
> world at a blazing pace :)
> Can't wait to get to know ya'll :)
> earthmoon
>
>
>
> Please come join us on the Positive Parenting e-list
> at: http://www.egroups.com/group/PositiveParenting-Discipline
> what did people do before diapers? what we're doing now :) Come check
out
> my Elimination Communication e-list
> : http://www.egroups.com/group/eliminationcommunication
>
>
>
>
> Message boards, timely articles, a free newsletter and more!
> Check it all out at: http://www.unschooling.com
>
> Addresses:
> Post message: Unschooling-dotcom@egroups.com
> Unsubscribe: Unschooling-dotcom-unsubscribe@egroups.com
> List owner: Unschooling-dotcom-owner@egroups.com
> List settings page: http://www.egroups.com/group/Unschooling-dotcom
>
>

messages.subject: Re: [Unschooling-dotcom] New to list in Seattle
messages.msgSnippet: Earthmoon: Welcome!  My name is Amy, and I am a homeschooling mom of one son.  My son is also spirited or Active/Alert as I have come to discover.  I
messages.messageBody:
Earthmoon:

Welcome! My name is Amy, and I am a homeschooling mom of one son. My son is
also "spirited" or "Active/Alert" as I have come to discover. I really enjoy
his spirit though.



In a message dated 07/30/2000 1:17:19 PM Pacific Daylight Time,
earthmoonwater@... writes:

> I look forward to getting to know the list, and hopefully to stay, if I
> click here :) Unschooling has been the educational goal I have for my
> children since I was in HS, and I revel in watching my 3yo learn about the
> world at a blazing pace :)
> Can't wait to get to know ya'll :)
> earthmoon
>
